name: Jidi Pollen Bag
description: Very dangerous. Very difficult to obtain more.

abilities.name: Pollinate
abilities.description: Spreads pollen on nearby enemies, reducing the effectiveness of health restoration on them, and dealing damage over time based on their maximum health.

effects.dormantCurioBonus: 15.6% max health as total damage (30% increase)

notes: Interrupt the caster's channeling abilities upon cast
Deals 1% (1.3% with Dormant Curio) of max health as damage in 1-second intervals, starting 1 second after the debuff is placed
Multiple casts do not stack, but refresh the duration

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
When crafted with the Dormant Curio, the max health as total damage is increased by 30%
